<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Far Lobber](/Feats.aspx?ID=94) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 76 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You’ve learned how to throw a longer distance. When you throw an alchemical bomb, it has a range increment of 30 feet instead of the usual 20 feet.

<title level="2">Far Lobber leads to...</title>
[Uncanny Bombs](/Feats.aspx?ID=115)
name: Far Lobber
